name: VerseoftheDay
0:
”Alexa open verse of the day”
””
”Alexa, open verse of the day and use the Living Bible”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: verse of the day
des: Hear the daily verse of the day from Bible Gateway. The user can switch the Bible version to King James Version, New King James, English Standard Version, New American Standard, New Revised Standard, New International Version, Living Bible, Good News Translation and New Living Translation.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
